oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chancery Court Case
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy of a case presented in the Chancery Court in Monroe County regarding the alleged stealing of a mule. Alexander Rider charges that James Smith, a soldier in the army and a son of Emmanuel Smith, had taken a mule from him. Rider is suing Emmanuel Smith for the actions of his son, who died in prison in December 1864 after being arrested and taken to prison in Knoxville.
